question: I have 63 days left to go, at week 30. I think I was having bh contractions last night.  They started at about 6-8 min apart lasting for 30-40 seconds,  then went to 3-4 minutes apart still lasting for 30-40 seconds. This all happened for about 2-3 hours, until I was so exhausted That I fell asleep. I tried laying down, standing,  sitting,  rocking everything to see if they would stop but nothing worked. Now this morning I feel like I did a huge long work out yesterday on my abs back and butt.  Plus my baby girl feels really low now,  she is still moving around allot but really low now.  I feel so sick that I feel like throwing up but I am afraid it will start something again or hurt really bad. Could this just be bh contractions or the real thing??  My stomach still feels really tight but I don't know if it's just from lay night or what. I am a high risk for preterm labor and am trying everything to not let her come to early.
title: i am kinda freaking out....  please help...
